Name: BadBee
About the game: The escape room adventure inside honeycomb starts with a little bee whose success comes out from the jail. The map is packed with a stylish honey background, that escape level hopes to attract the player. Actually BadBee is a 2D escape game that has a simple mission, which is to collect honey pots and find the key, along other treasures on each level. You must think deeply about the best route strategies and solve any puzzles to complete each level. HIGHLIGHT FEATURES ON PC VERSION: üêù The game arena is wider than the mobile version üêù Simple gameplay but hard to master üêù Deep tactics to escape each stage from different challenges each level üêù Not only collect the key but you should collect every honey pot per level üêù Have to plan more than 3 stages, and every stage has 10 levels. üêù Some levels have multiple rooms to more challenge üêù You can play anywhere on different devices with steam cloud support
